step1.para: If previously removed, install the O-ring in the bore of the range cylinder housing ( Figure 251).

figure.caption: Figure 250. Install O-Ring in Bore of Range Cylinder Housing

step1.para: Position the new gasket on the housing mounting surface and install the cylinder housing in the rear bore of the auxiliary housing, air fitting to the upper left ( Figure 252). Apply Loctite 242 to the mounting bolt threads. Install and tighten bolts to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 Nm).

figure.caption: Figure 251. Install Cylinder Housing in Rear Bore of Auxiliary Housing

step1.para: Place the range yoke into position with the sliding clutch of the synchronizer assembly, long hub of yoke to the rear ( Figure 253). Insert threaded end of yoke bar through the yoke and into the bore of the range cylinder housing, aligning the notches in the bar with yoke lockscrew holes.

figure.caption: Figure 252. Place Range Yoke into Position

step1.para: Install the two yoke lockscrews, tighten and wire securely ( Figure 254).
If previously removed, install the O-rings in the I.D. and O.D. of the range piston ( Figure 255).

figure.caption: Figure 254. Install O-Rings in I.D. and O.D. of Range Piston

step1.para: In the cylinder housing bore, install the range piston on the yoke bar, flat side to the rear ( Figure 256). Secure with nut tightened to 70 to 85 ft-lbs. (95 to 115 Nm) ( inset, Figure 256).

figure.caption: Figure 255. Install Range Piston on Yoke Bar, and Secure With Nut

step1.para: Position the new gasket on the cover mounting surface and install the range cylinder cover on the housing, open port to the upper left ( Figure 257). Apply Loctite 242 to the cover bolts. Install and tighten bolts to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 Nm).

figure.caption: Figure 256. Install Range Cylinder Cover on Housing
